name: Hacked (itch) (Yuna.ink, PtiteMadeleine, nyncral)
description:
[ENJAM 2022] Made in 48 hours with the theme is "We are Legion"

Your computer has been hacked by an Anonymous ! Play with him or he'll destroy your PC !

__________________________________________________

Challenges :

- Peaceful : No combat or killing in game.

- A Capella : All sound effect and music are made a capella (with our mouth)

- I Only Need One Hand : Game playable using only one hand. 

__________________________________________________

Credits :

PtiteMadeleine, Nyncral, Yuna.Ink
